sources.title: The Miracle Rider (1935) TOM MIXüçï15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Tom Mix, Charles Middleton, Joan Gale, Jason Robards Sr.
Directed by: B. Reeves Eason & Armand Schaefer

In this Sensational Masot serial, a rancher and oil company owner intends to drive the Ravenhead Indians off their reservation to mine the superexplosive element "X-94" discovered on their land. Can Texas Ranger Tom Morgan stop him and save the tribe?

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
1:08       CHAPTER 1: The Vanishing Indian
44:03     CHAPTER 2: The Firebird Strikes
1:04:34  CHAPTER 3: The Flying Knife
1:23:39  CHAPTER 4: A Race with Death
1:41:50  CHAPTER 5: Double-Barreled Doom
2:01:02  CHAPTER 6: Thundering Hoofs
2:19:37  CHAPTER 7: The Dragnet
2:38:19  CHAPTER 8: Guerilla Warfare
2:57:11  CHAPTER 9: The Silver Road
3:15:44  CHAPTER 10: Signal Fires
3:35:13  CHAPTER 11: A Traitor Dies
3:54:01  CHAPTER 12: Danger Rides with Death
4:13:03  CHAPTER 13: The Secret of X-94
4:30:39  CHAPTER 14: Between Two Fires
4:50:06  CHAPTER 15: Justice Rides the Plains
5:08:53  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: In 1930s Texas, following the murder of his father, Tom Morgan joins the Texas Rangers to avenge his father's death and to follow in his path as a proponent of Indian rights. His task as a Ranger is to stop the evil Zaroff and his gang, who are smuggling the elements for a powerful explosive from a mine on Indian land.
metadata.Writer: Barney A. Sarecky, Wellyn Totman, Gerald Geraghty
metadata.Actors: Tom Mix, Charles Middleton, Joan Gale
